results.title: Metformin Prevents or Delays the Development and Progression of Osteoarthritis: New Insight and Mechanism of Action
results.text_hl: Along with more in-depth research on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and its molecular mechanism in recent decades, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has also been proposed as an effective drug to prevent or delay @<m>DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009140 @@@musculoskeletal disorders@@@, including @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@).

results.title: The effects of metformin with lifestyle therapy in polycystic ovary syndrome: a randomized double-blind study.
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ group had increased @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ and @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, but fewer @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001745 @@@bladder infections@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009140 @@@musculoskeletal complaints@@@.
